sections.heading: Record
sections.text:
of transactions required to be maintained by pawnbroker; certificate of right to

pledge or sell property; inspection of record and goods.

sections.heading: Reports
sections.text: of transactions and suspected stolen property to sheriffs and chiefs of police.

sections.heading: Retention
sections.text: and removal of property received in pledge.

sections.heading: Retention
sections.text: and removal of motor vehicles received in pledge.

sections.heading: Peace
sections.text:
officer may place written hold on property received in pledge; procedure for

peace officer to obtain custody of property; limitations on disposal of

property; duties of peace officer and pawnbroker concerning property; immunity.

sections.heading: Rate
sections.text:
of interest; period for redemption; printed receipts; charge for storage of

motor vehicle.
